snippet.title: Them's Fightin' Herds - Nidra Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The third character in our Season 1 Pass is revealed! The trailer premiered at Combo Breaker 2023.

Them’s Fightin’ Herds is available now on PlayStation 4 & 5, Xbox One & Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Steam, and the Epic Games Store.

Get TFH: https://mane6.com/buy

Website: https://mane6.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/tfh
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mane6dev
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/mane6dev
